Why I'm Giving This Away

Simple. I make money managing ads, not selling "how to manage ads" courses.

Every agency owner hoards their SOPs like they're nuclear codes. But here's what I learned: The bottleneck isn't knowledge—it's execution.

You can have every template I use. Most people still won't execute. The ones who do become great partners or clients.

Plus, openly sharing what I do attracts better clients who already understand the value.
